8005.title: Revolver
8005.description: After violent criminals kidnap the wife of a tough prison warden and demand the release of an inmate, but the warden strikes back with a hostage of his own!

8056.title: The Cynic, the Rat & the Fist
8056.description: In one of best Italian crime thrillers of 70s, a cunning cop (Maurizio Merli) sees an opportunity to take the syndicate down when street warfare breaks out between a young ganster and a sadistic crime boss!

20497.title: Bullet Explosion
20497.description: Get ready for some hard-hitting Yakuza action - at the mercy of their violent lifestyles, two brothers are determined to make a name for themselves in the Japanese gangster society.

273077.title: Shopping
273077.description: Billy and Jo are the leaders of a teen gang of "ram-raiders," car thieves who jack a car, ram it through the front of a store, and steal whatever booty they can carry before the cops arrive.

307203.title: Blood Out
307203.description: Having assumed an undercover identity as a gangster to solve his brother's murder, a sheriff finds himself more in character than he anticipated.

312169.title: Brannigan
312169.description: A former police detective from Chicago is sent to England to retrieve an American racketeer. But the criminal is kidnapped before he arrives.

312178.title: Foxy Brown
312178.description: After her brother betrays her, a woman goes undercover as a prostitute in order to find the gangsters who killed her boyfriend ‚Äî and get revenge.

314504.title: Easy Money II: Hard to Kill
314504.description: JW is serving hard time in prison and struggling to get back on an honest path. But when he crosses path with his former gang, JW learns that once you've walked in the shoes of a criminal there just may be no going back.

314511.title: 22 Bullets
314511.description: Having been left for dead with 22 bullets in his body after being shot by a former childhood friend, a retired mobster sets out to get his revenge.

317189.title: Fatal Beauty
317189.description: When a tainted drug shipment hits the streets of L.A., a witty narcotics cop goes undercover to investigate in this fast-paced romantic comedy.

354260.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
354260.description: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

360635.title: Top Coat Cash
360635.description: After losing a major fight, a professional MMA fighter returns home from Vegas, where he reunites with various individuals from his past - including a father/son duo who recruit him to engage in their daring bank heists.

367803.title: Ready 2 Die
367803.description: After stealing a bag of cash, a group of bank robbers must fend off gangs and crooked cops alike as they strive to keep their loot and stay alive.

376058.title: Mob Rules
376058.description: Two criminals travel across the country to locate their former partner in order to retrieve the money they're owed from a failed heist years earlier.

376179.title: The White Storm
376179.description: Three lifelong friends, now Hong Kong cops, take on a powerful drug lord, but when a sting operation fails, they must make a devastating decision.

386218.title: A Gangland Love Story
386218.description: When the sister of a crime lord falls in love with a man from a rival gang, they steal a car to run away but its cargo makes them a bigger target.

407892.title: Two Plates
407892.description: When two street hustlers come across counterfeit plates, their rivalry escalates into an all out street war full of deceit and sabotage.

413145.title: Final Justice
413145.description: Two mafiosos trying to cross the border wind up wrecked and stranded in Texas amid a host of escalating trouble that trails them all the way to Malta.

436413.title: Turf War
436413.description: A detective chasing down rogue cops sets out to prove that his sergeant has been framing area murders on a pair of motorcycle gang members.

443628.title: Hunter
443628.description: A lieutenant‚Äôs life changes when three cases hit him at once: a rogue cop killer, a beautiful runaway serial killer, and his boss blackmailing him.

449105.title: Narx
449105.description: Based on a true story, an undercover cop risks his life to fight police corruption while trying to take down New York's biggest drug kingpin.

451340.title: Machine
451340.description: A former mercenary turned criminal is tasked with killing three witnesses testifying against his new boss, while the top lieutenant keeps him on task.

454199.title: King of the Game
454199.description: A man trying to leave the crime game gets drawn in further when he decides to rescue a woman from prostitution and a boss marks him for murder.

454640.title: Mafioso Mexicano (Mafia Man)
454640.description: Mafioso Mexicano (Mafia Man) is a story filled with blood and honor. Damian Chapa (Blood In Blood Out, Under Siege, Street Fighter, El Padroni) stars as Eduardo, A Robstown, Texas small-town gangster who grows up without his mother, whom was killed by DEA Agent Phil Sky (Torch Song Trilogy). Eduardo never forgets the way his mother was slaughtered in Mexico by the country boy DEA agent. Eduardo moves to Texas to grow up with his Uncle Bernardo (Roland Chapa, DSK Story). Uncle Bernardo raises Eduardo to become one of the most respected drug dealers in South Texas in the family business. Eduardo and his uncle suddenly get a hit put on them by a rival Mexican connection across the border. They seek revenge but it is too late. Uncle Bernardo is gunned down in the street.

455663.title: Dirty Dead Con Men
455663.description: When a dangerous conspiracy sucks them in, a burned out cop and a slippery crook lean on each other to try to take down the powerful players involved.

456912.title: Scarred City
456912.description: A young cop is trained to be a ruthless killer as part of a police hit squad. But when he has second thoughts, he'll have to fight his own.

456950.title: Bloodrunners
456950.description: During Prohibition, a cop realizes bootleggers are the least of his problems when he discovers a popular speakeasy has been infiltrated by vampires.

463190.title: El Ejecutor
463190.description: Le achacan a un tirador solitario el asesinato de un pol√≠tico, pero dos detectvies descubren un complot y luchan contra el poder detr√°s del crimen.

466021.title: Murphy's Law
466021.description: When a cop is framed for murder and chained to a felon, the duo make a break for it, trying to stay a step ahead of the law and the real killer.

466708.title: 6 Ways to Die
466708.description: A man of mystery hires six criminals to help him take revenge on a drug kingpin and make him suffer in all the ways he did at his target‚Äôs hands.

466810.title: Love and Bullets
466810.description: A loner with a grudge against a mob boss jumps at the chance to get even when the FBI sends him to Switzerland to kidnap the gangster‚Äôs girlfriend.

466895.title: Nightstick
466895.description: New York City is going up in flames unless a maverick cop can stop a crew of terrorists holding the metropolis hostage with explosives.

468014.title: Dead Man Running
468014.description: An ex-con involves his best friend in a tangled mission, with only 24 hours to spare, to help raise the cash he owes to a deadly loan shark.

476653.title: Death Game
476653.description: A hard-boiled cop must track down a female serial killer to stop a series of police assassinations.

476692.title: No Man's Land
476692.description: Everything changes for a Los Angeles rookie cop after he goes undercover to trap a wealthy auto buff who operates a hot-car ring.

477510.title: The Messenger
477510.description: A Green Beret unleashes his vengeance on the drug gangs he holds responsible for selling his girlfriend the drugs that led to her fatal overdose.

480254.title: Mafia
480254.description: Set in the 1970s, a crime boss and his crew leave bodies wherever they go while a detective and his partner will go to any lengths to bring them down.

486388.title: The Big Racket
486388.description: Fabio Testi stars as Inspector Nico Palmieri, a tough police detective tearing apart Rome to bust a ruthless protection racket. But when these violent thugs expand their empire into drugs, rape and murder, Nico throws away the rulebook to unleash his own brand of justice. In a city ruled by fear, there's a fine line between cop and criminal, and one lawman is about to blast it to pieces!

486394.description: A cold-blooded cop goes deep undercover to take down an international drug syndicate but when a hair-trigger Interpol agent joins the investigation, the case takes a deadly detour into sexual depravity and violence.

486646.title: Fire of Conscience
486646.description: Facing a corrupt bureau, a police captain tries to prove his partner‚Äôs innocence by teaming up with a narcotics officer with mysterious motives.

487967.title: Distant Justice
487967.description: After losing his family to violent criminals, a man begins to pick apart the crooked politicians and street thugs who are responsible.

489709.title: New York Cop
489709.description: An undercover cop from Japan infiltrates a crime syndicate in New York. But his growing bond with the gang's leader could threaten his life.

490230.title: Lock & Key
490230.description: Two seperate detectives go undercover to find the distributor of a new drug. But their different angles will collide into the same dangerous path.

492792.title: The Collectors
492792.description: When a New Orleans mob boss sends two trusted hitmen men to New York City to collect overdue debts, alliances shift and chaos ensues.

494842.title: Shottas
494842.description: Two young men from Jamaica climb to the top of the criminal world in Miami, with a constant presence of drugs, extortion, and deceit.

497833.title: Narco Valley
497833.description: An ex-kingpin resolved to a clean life following his release from prison is pulled back into crime, only to be deceived out of his rebuilt empire.

499105.title: The Flower and the Sword
499105.description: When a businessman oversees the building of a bridge in Japan, a powerful gangster tries to stop the project by threatening his mother‚Äôs life.

504564.title: Blue Vengeance
504564.description: Ex-cop Mickey McCardle needs to solve the brutal murder of his partner. When a NYC serial killer fits the bill, McCardle hunts him down.

504644.title: Venice Underground
504644.description: When a turf war between two rival drug gangs kills a narcotics officer, a group of police cadets have 48 hours to solve the case or get suspended.

505308.title: Corrupt
505308.description: After decades of violence between two deadly street gangs, a truce begins to form when  a young man changes his ways, or at least tries to.

505402.title: Exiled
505402.description: A trio of tangled friendships begin when a former gangster befriends the hitmen sent to kill him and the men sent to save his life.

506050.title: Antidote
506050.description: A skilled hitman longs to get out of the game, but first he must endure one more night of violence while teamed up with an undercover cop.

512395.title: Marie
512395.description: An ex-cop wants to live a quiet life until her husband is murdered, and she takes vengeance, unleashing a one-woman bloodbath on the mob.

513566.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords

514067.title: The Last of the Finest
514067.description: An honorable LA cop and his crew discover a sinister plot and go rogue to battle an unholy alliance of smugglers, arms dealers, and government agents

515828.title: The Executioner Part II
515828.description: A Vietnam vet turned cop teams up with a reporter to hunt down and bring justice to the masked serial killer who‚Äôs been terrorizing Los Angeles.

515940.title: Hostage
515940.description: A businessman‚Äôs wife is kidnapped by local thugs who hope to score a shipment of drugs from her husband. Meanwhile, she‚Äôs got other plans.

515978.title: Shot
515978.description: Tasked with taking down a local drug kingpin, a detective duo enlists a low-level pusher and his girlfriend to go undercover to avoid prison.

518383.title: Clockin' Green
518383.description: When a high-stakes bank robbery has two lifelong best friends running from the law, ultimate betrayal turns them into mortal enemies.

518981.title: 2 Dead 2 Kill
518981.description: An ex-narc stumbles upon clues to the location of a multi-million-dollar stash of stolen heroin and races against time and two drug lords to find it.

519170.title: Killing American Style
519170.description: After a dangerous gang escapes from prison, they take a family hostage. Now, it‚Äôs up to the uncompromising patriarch to take down these criminals.

520023.title: Narcotic Justice
520023.description: As two detectives track down a former associate of a dangerous drug lord, they discover more disturbing details about why he stole from his boss.

522280.title: Operation Mekong
522280.description: An international task force seeks justice against the leader of an Asian drug cartel and his murderous henchmen.

526186.title: La Dama de la Mafia (Doblado)
526186.description: Qued√≥ hu√©rfana veinte a√±os atr√°s y ahora, desde el seno de la familia de la mafia que la adopt√≥, est√° decidida a vengar la muerte de sus padres.

527141.title: Brave Men's Blood
527141.description: Corruption, torture, and drugs run rampant when the Internal Affairs case of a sketchy police lieutenant leads to the underworld in Iceland‚Äôs capital.

528599.title: Takers
528599.description: High-octane thriller about a group of notorious criminals whose streak of untraceable bank heists may come to an end thanks to a hardcore detective.

535428.title: Freight
535428.description: A Russian gang enslaving and trafficking Eastern European women in the sex trade crosses the wrong businessman when they kidnap his daughter.

536258.title: Mad Foxes
536258.description: After a Nazi biker gang murders his family and viciously attacks his girlfriend, a man sets out to get bloody revenge against the criminals.

538011.title: Boogie el aceitoso (Doblado)
538011.description: Es machista, violento, s√°dico y r√°pido con el gatillo, un mercenario consumado a quien las mujeres lo aman y los delincuentes le temen.

542960.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
542960.description: Nightclub owner Lee Chan-Woo turns vigilante justice warrior when he decides to investigate a high-profile drug case involving a famous entertainer.

543775.title: We Still Steal the Old Way
543775.description: The Archer Gang are back and doing a daring heist in the heart of London...right up to the point when the armed police come crashing in.

545648.title: Outrage Coda
545648.description: This third installment of the Outrage trilogy finds former yakuza boss Otomo running enforcement in South Korea for a renowned and influential fixer.

548365.title: Queen Pin 2: The Restoration
548365.description: After the death of the original Queen Pin, Lil Miller and Killer have moved on to new business endeavors, but a tragedy brings them back in the game.

549529.title: The Butcher
549529.description: Merle Hench is a mob enforcer who has just escaped a deadly trap, and now he‚Äôs out for some good old-fashioned revenge against his former boss.

551716.title: Nirvana
551716.description: Quer√≠a desquitarse del mandam√°s de su banda delictiva por dejarlo fuera de la jugada. Quer√≠a robarle el mandado, pero no era el √∫nico tras ese dinero.

555703.title: Coffy
555703.description: A tough and sexy vigilante uses her brains and guns to clean up the streets and get revenge after her sister falls victim to local drug dealers.

556578.title: The Through
556578.description: An undercover police officer's investigation into a child abduction case is threatened when his identity is exposed.

559459.title: Blitz (Espa√±ol)
559459.description: Un polic√≠a fuerte es designado para atrapar a un asesino en serie que ataca a oficiales de polic√≠a.

561888.title: Five-O
561888.description: The story of two Detroit police officers who get in over their heads when they decide to take a crooked path involving a ruthless drug lord.

563511.title: Lost Money
563511.description: When four armed robbers score seven million dollars in their latest hit, the group slowly turns on each other in a deadly game of greed.

567373.title: Illegal Business
567373.description: A street criminal in Oakland, California is already on the outs with his boss. When he gets befriends a corrupt cop, all hell is sure to break loose.

574351.title: Kill Kane
574351.description: After his wife and children are brutally murdered by a gang, a man decides that he must settle the score himself and sets out to avenge them.

575231.title: Bullet Ride
575231.description: In the red for five million dollars, a duo of film producers hatch a plan to make their latest feature a success by killing off its star actor.

576097.title: Dangerous Game
576097.description: To help his best friend pay off a gambling debt and avoid certain death, a footballer joins the dangerous ranks of Russian and Algerian gangsters.

576925.title: Straight Outta H8
576925.description: With a rise in police shootings of unarmed citizens, a reclusive revolutionary declares his own private war on the government officials responsible.

577807.description: On assignment to kill a failed candidate, mob henchman Joe King also kills his wife, Miranda, a key component to why he lives a life of crime in obedient silence. Encompassed with regret and rage, Joe sets about killing those he blames for the traumatic events he and Miranda have endured.

585812.title: On the Job
585812.description: The fact-based account of an overseas government scandal where high-ranking military personnel released prison inmates as contract killers on demand.

585840.title: The Thieves
585840.description: Five master thieves prep for the score of their lives as they each take their positions, from scaling walls to safecracking and brilliant disguises.

585846.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
585846.description: A crime boss with retribution on his mind after surviving a near-fatal attack by a serial killer convinces a detective to help catch the murderer.

589224.title: The Adventures of Paula Peril
589224.description: Courageous reporter Paula Peril investigates super-villains and criminals, facing thugs working for a corrupt mobster and other dangerous bad guys.

591372.title: Chasing the Dragon (Dubbed)
591372.description: International action star Donnie Yen portrays the notorious real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho who became notoriously wealthy in 1960s Hong Kong.

591820.title: First Love (Dubbed)
591820.description: Over the course of a single night in Tokyo, a young boxer and a sex worker meet in a whilrwind of romance and accidental drug smuggling.

592458.title: Narco Soldiers
592458.description: A Caribbean drug runner and his lover make their empire by instigating turf wars between foreign cartels ‚Äì a decision that could kill them quickly.

594700.title: Cuesti√≥n De Principios
594700.description: Un polic√≠a ser√° v√≠ctima de asedio y sabotaje luego de ser testigo de un crimen a sangre fr√≠a, cometido por sus superiores.

599293.title: NYC Finest
599293.description: A New York City cop, Dan, is partnered with a young Boston cop, Nick, both of which hate working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to hunt an elite killer and his drug organization.

600365.title: Snitch'd
600365.description: When the South Side Gang and the Cut Throat Mafia start a drug war at a local high school in Santa Ana, CA, detective McClure goes undercover to investigate the brutal murder of a young Latina student. The gang members are the key suspects but nobody is talking. And as McClure continues to dig for answers, it becomes clear that the two gangs are fighting for territory - and nobody is getting in their way.

600997.description: Zane is a gambler who's in over his head. With thirty-six hours to pay his debt, he ends up in the middle of a high-stakes game against the mafia. He must find out who wants him dead and why.

601995.title: The Alliance
601995.description: It‚Äôs been twenty years since four drug dealers have formed a peaceful pact, but after one member takes revenge on another, all hell breaks loose.

604701.title: The Hurricane Express
604701.description: When his father is killed in a train wreck, Larry Baker vows to unmask a mysterious criminal called "The Wrecker," who has targeted the L&M Railroad for deadly" accidents."

605700.title: The Grand Heist
605700.description: When corrupt officials corner the ice market, a gang of professionals from various fields goes on a mission to rob ice blocks from their storage unit.

605717.title: Jack Movez
605717.description: Two brothers with an unsuccessful jewelry store mimic a band of local armed robbers to rob themselves for the insurance money, but revenge is swift.

605749.title: The Dope Game
605749.description: Two California hit men for a brutal drug lord fly to Texas to bring back a stash of heroin from a Mexican trafficker before all hell breaks loose.

606518.title: Twice
606518.description: In a world where no one can be trusted, Dereck and his crew fight for a piece of the drug game but will have to stay one step ahead of the feds.

607308.title: A Cold Case: Based on True Jack Boyz Stories
607308.description: When a member of a highly disciplined street gang violates a cardinal rule, he unwittingly sets the stage for his own girlfriend‚Äôs kidnapping.

610418.title: Hitman's Hero
610418.description: After witnessing a murder as a child, Paul grows up to become a family man with a secret life as an assasin picking off marks in suburban Melbourne.

610529.title: First Lady 3
610529.description: Everyone wants payback for something in this third entry of the popular ‚ÄòFirst Lady‚Äô franchise about a fierce woman who overcomes murder and betrayal.

611656.title: Paydirt
611656.description: Five years after a DEA bust went wrong, a man recently released from prison teams up with his old gang to find a hidden bag of cash.

611689.title: Bulldog Drummond Comes Back
611689.description: After the detective, his girlfriend, and their sidekick are kidnapped by enemies, it‚Äôs up to a Scotland Yard inspector to help them get out of a jam.

612037.title: Honor Up
612037.description: In the wake of a devastating shootout, the lieutenant for a drug syndicate kingpin fights for his honor and to save his partners in crime.

614070.title: First Lady 2: Maria's Revenge
614070.description: Revenge is a dish served cold-blooded in this hit sequel where Maria has a bounty on her head for killing the wife of the kingpin who killed her man.

617054.title: Vendetta
617054.description: When his parents are slaughtered, a special ops interrogation officer must evade the police and his old unit in order to exact his gruesome revenge.

619636.title: Cold War 2
619636.description: Following his rescue operation, Sean Lau is promoted to police commissioner and who is forced to turn to a former rival when his family is kidnapped.

619646.title: Firestorm
619646.description: A humiliated police force foiled by a gang of daylight robbers tries to redeem itself by putting a hard boiled cop on the case with a lax moral code.

621694.title: Grimy
621694.description: An undercover cop who can get close to thugs who terrorize the streets with drugs and violence, is conflicted when assigned to his old neighborhood.

621979.title: The Criminal Mind
621979.description: On opposite sides of the law, a mafia boss and his district attorney younger brother go to war after one frames the other for a double murder.

628174.title: How to Steal 2 Million
628174.description: After his release from prison, Jack tries to go straight but money woes lead him back into the game with the promise of a million-dollar payoff.

633211.title: Big Guns/No Way Out
633211.description: When a contract killer for the mob is brutally punished for trying to leave the game, he sets out on a revenge mission against his former bosses.

642292.title: Avenged
642292.description: An honest, but ambitious undercover cop risks his career, as well as his  life to settle a score with his corrupt superiors on the police force.

648179.title: Road
648179.description: A reformed criminal who went straight is thrust back into his old life to avenge the murder of his brother who was killed during a drug deal gone bad.

660133.title: Rapid Fire
660133.description: A band of armed suspects leads police on a wild chase after an attempted bank robbery in the semi-rural city of Norco, California.

661115.title: Downtown Heat
661115.description: Young jazz composer, Steve, turns vengeful commando against local drug mafia capos when Caribbean drug dealers kill his wife, Maria.

671471.title: Streets of Syndicate, Ohio
671471.description: When two old friends in a small Ohio town are handed a valuable briefcase by a small time criminal, and sent on an incredible adventure.

675533.title: 45 Expansiva
675533.description: Un poderoso funcionario p√∫blico ordena el secuestro, robo y asesinato de su secretaria, quien estuvo a su servicio durante muchos a√±os.

675594.title: In the Line of Duty: The Price of Vengeance
675594.description: The friend of an assassinated prosecutor sets out to get revenge on Johnny Moore, the notorious gang leader who took his friend's life.

675602.title: In the Line of Duty: Hunt for Justice
675602.description: After seeing the link between a terrorist ring and the murder of his coworker, a state trooper joins forces with the FBI on a massive five-state hunt.

675956.title: The Boondock Saints (Doblado)
675956.description: Dos hermanos cat√≥licos irlandeses se convierten en justicieros y acaban con el inframundo criminal de la ciudad de Boston en nombre de Dios.

676277.title: The Con Artists
676277.description: An expert team of thieves that pull off a headline-grabbing heist are recruited for an operation against one of the continent‚Äôs top security systems.

681255.title: Dog Bite Dog
681255.description: A Cambodian boxer working as an assassin in Hong Kong befriends a girl while on the run from a renegade cop hell-bent on catching him.

682548.title: The Big Sweat
682548.description: Just released from jail, an ex-con returns home only to become embroiled in a robbery and is hounded by a tenacious FBI agent every step of the way.

685920.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
685920.description: After he's fired from his mechanic gig, a hot-tempered ex-boxer enters the drug-running game which lands him in the battleground of a brutal prison.

687481.title: The Gang's All Here
687481.description: After taking jobs as truck drivers, two friends find themselves targeted by saboteurs who will stop at nothing to take down their trucking company.

689416.title: Partners in Action
689416.description: Framed for a murder he didn‚Äôt commit, a security guard goes on the run and enlists the help of a rebellious teenager to help prove his innocence.

693485.title: Bodymore
693485.description: It‚Äôs the 1970s, and Percy wants what's his, dead or alive. With his partner‚Äôs help, he will get his bag delivered to him before the night is through.

693795.title: The Brutal 9
693795.description: Riot is hired by a covert organization to infiltrate and execute an escape from one of the world's deadliest and most secretive black site prisons.

694683.title: Double Nickels
694683.description: A pair of highway patrolmen with a car reposession side hustle come to realize they‚Äôve been duped into participating in an auto theft ring.

695786.title: Juegos De Venganza (Doblado)
695786.description: Un grupo de agentes de la DEA se infiltran como seguridad de un casino donde descubren v√≠nculos entre los traficantes de drogas y la seguridad.

698678.title: The Glove
698678.description: An ex-cop-turned-bounty hunter has his toughest assignment ever to capture a giant-sized ex-con donning body armor and steel-plated gauntlets.

705428.title: Yenni Thuniga
705428.description: After his fianc√© is accidentally killed in a jewel heist gone wrong, a man seeks revenge on the gang responsible.

705624.title: Mr. Mayfair: A Song to Kill for
705624.description: Max Mayfair has it all: a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family and‚Äîthanks to his latest heist‚Äîa priceless diamond necklace.

705625.title: Mr. Mayfair
705625.description: Max Mayfair is living the good life. Having left New York City and his past as a gangster, he now runs the most glamorous club in all of London.

708489.title: Justicia Divina
708489.description: Fernando, un hombre de origen humilde, se enamora de la hija del narcotraficante m√°s temido del pueblo, quien contrata a un sicario para que lo mate.

708492.title: P Storm
708492.description: In this fourth installment of the franchise, William Luk goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.

709233.title: Yakuza Wolf
709233.description: The son of a murder crime boss exacts his revenge by pitting two rival clans against each other and saving his sister from an elite trafficking ring.

709234.description: Chiba exacts his revenge for the setup that sent him to prison by attacking Asao Uchida's lonely, clifftop mansion in a no-holds barred massacre.

709583.title: The Brave
709583.description: In an Albanian town known for drug production and trafficking, an elite group of cops set out to end the war against the local police.

711050.description: Undercover detective Nayome Henderson is tasked with taking down a notorious narcotics kingpin and uses his girlfriend to infiltrate the organization.

712097.title: Justified Force
712097.description: A cop who comes out of retirement and his new partner will be forced to put their differences aside while investigating a dangerous drug operation.

713634.description: After kingpin Big Slime is killed in prison, his wife, Lts, baby mammas and dirty cops face off in a frantic search for his secret $10 million stash.

723322.description: Se contrata a un detective privado para resolver el secuestro de un joven, pero el joven es asesinado y el detective lo pierde todo.

100002648.description: Numerous close calls and failed missions cause policeman Don Lee to often feel let down, until he meets an informant who helps change his views.
